019
020package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.imports;
021
022/**
023 * Represents the strategy when none of the rules (allow/disallow tags) match
024 * inside subpackage and import-control tag of ImportControlCheck config.
025 *
026 * @see ImportControlCheck
027 */
028public enum MismatchStrategy {
029
030    /**
031     * In a case if matching allow/disallow rule was not found,
032     * decision should be delegated to the parent and continue checking.
033     */
034    DELEGATE_TO_PARENT,
035
036    /**
037     * In a case if matching allow/disallow rule was not found,
038     * import will be allowed by default.
039     */
040    ALLOWED,
041
042    /**
043     * In a case if matching allow/disallow rule was not found,
044     * import will be disallowed by default.
045     */
046    DISALLOWED,
047
048}
